underlying_goal: To set up a new project for an agentic harness with appropriate documentation (CLAUDE.md), commands, and skills, inspired by Apollo Research's work.
friction_detail: Claude initially created a highly opinionated and prescriptive project structure, which the user rejected. Claude had to backtrack and provide a more minimal setup focused on reference materials and commands.
primary_success: Claude successfully pivoted after user feedback, revising its initial over-engineered solution to a minimal, flexible set of reference documents and commands that met the user's actual needs.
brief_summary: The user asked for a project setup for an agentic harness. Claude initially created a very opinionated directory structure, which the user disliked. After feedback, Claude revised its approach, providing a much simpler setup with just documentation and commands, which satisfied the user.
